name: Deathless
summary: Deathless is a megawad PWAD for The Ultimate Doom by James Paddock (Jimmy). Originally just a single Episode 4 replacement released as Griefless on July 1, 2018, it was extended to a full replacement of all four episodes when released on November 9 of the same year. On May 14, 2020, it was added to the list of official add-ons for the Doom Classic Unity port, with various visual changes as summarized by a Doomworld forums post.
